unnormalised: ## Chai Pe Charcha: Bollywood Edition! Who's Dating Who?!
normalised: ## Chai Pe Charcha: Bollywood Edition! Who's Dating Who?!

unnormalised: Okay, people, spill the chai! This week's gossip is HOTTER than a Delhi summer! It's time for your weekly dose of Bollywood buzz, straight from the grapevine.
normalised: Okay, people, spill the chai! This week's gossip is hotter than a Delhi summer! It's time for your weekly dose of Bollywood buzz, straight from the grapevine.

unnormalised: First up, rumours are swirling around Isha Ambani's cousin, Priya, and her possible romance with Rohan Mehra (remember him from "Yeh Rishta Kya Kehlata Hai"?). Spotted at a recent Diwali bash looking awfully cozy! My insider says they were practically glued to each other all night, skipping the Laddoo stand for some serious heart-to-heart. Could this be the next big Bollywood romance? Guess we’ll have to wait and see if wedding bells ring at Antilia soon!
normalised: First up, rumours are swirling around Isha Ambani's cousin, Priya, and her possible romance with Rohan Mehra (remember him from "Yeh Rishta Kya Kehlata Hai"?). Spotted at a recent Diwali bash looking awfully cozy! My insider says they were practically glued to each other all night, skipping the Laddoo stand for some serious heart-to-heart. Could this be the next big Bollywood romance? Guess we’ll have to wait and see if wedding bells ring at Antilia soon!

unnormalised: Then there's the ongoing saga of Ranbir Kapoor and Alia Bhatt's baby Raha. Seems like EVERYONE is obsessed with getting a glimpse of the little one. Paparazzi are camping outside their Bandra apartment 24/7. Guys, give them a break! Let the kid enjoy her childhood! But I gotta admit, I'm curious too... what designer clothes is she rocking?! Probably Manish Malhotra, right?
normalised: Then there's the ongoing saga of Ranbir Kapoor and Alia Bhatt's baby Raha. Seems like everyone is obsessed with getting a glimpse of the little one. unnormalised: Speaking of Manish Malhotra, his latest fashion show was THE place to be seen. Everyone from Ananya Pandey to Janhvi Kapoor strutted their stuff in his dazzling creations. But the real drama unfolded backstage. Apparently, there was a major catfight between two leading ladies over the same lehnga! Sources say there were tears, raised voices, and a whole lot of glitter flying around. I'm dying to know who it was! Any tips? Send them in!

unnormalised: And finally, whispers are circulating that Karan Johar is planning another season of "Koffee with Karan". This time, he's allegedly going to feature some of the most controversial couples in Bollywood. Get ready for some serious fireworks, folks! I'm hoping for a SRK and Gauri Khan episode! That would break the internet!

That would break the internet!

unnormalised: That's all for this week's dose of gossip. Remember to take it with a pinch of namak! Until next time, keep sipping the chai and keep the gossip flowing! Don't forget to subscribe to our blog for more desi dish! I heard from my Nani that Sonam Kapoor is expecting baby no. 2. What are your thoughts? Comment below!
